import styles from './layout.module.scss' import { Link, Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' import { SearchIcon } from 'assets/svgs' const Layout = () => { const debounceSearch = useMemo( () => debounce((value) => { setSearch(value) }, 1000), [setSearch] ) const handleInputClick = () => { if (isPopup) return setIsSearchListShow((prev) => !prev) } const handleChange = (e: ChangeEvent) => { const { value } = e.currentTarget setInput(value) debounceSearch(value) } const handleCancelClick = () => { setIsSearchListShow((prev) => !prev) } const handleSubmit = (e: FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() navigate(`searchresult/${input}`) setInput('') let searchStoreArray = store.get('searchStore') const tmpArray = searchStoreArray.filter((item: string) => item !== input) searchStoreArray = [...tmpArray, input] store.set('searchStore', searchStoreArray) } return (
오늘의책
  • Home
  • 추천도서
  • 이벤트
) } export default Layout
